parameter.name: bootstrapServers
parameter.description: The format is host1:port1,host2:port2

parameter.name: keySerializerClass
parameter.description: Serializer class for key that implements the Serializer interface.

parameter.name: valueSerializerClass
parameter.description: Serializer class for value that implements the Serializer interface.

parameter.name: acks
parameter.description: The number of acknowledgments the producer requires the leader to have received before considering a request complete.

parameter.name: bufferMemory
parameter.description: The total bytes of memory the producer can use to buffer records waiting to be sent to the server.

parameter.name: compressionType
parameter.description: The compression type for all data generated by the producer.

parameter.name: retries
parameter.description: Setting a value greater than zero will cause the client to resend any record whose send fails with a potentially transient error.

parameter.name: sslKeyPassword
parameter.description: The password of the private key in the key store file. This is optional for client.

parameter.name: sslKeystoreLocation
parameter.description: The location of the key store file. This is optional for client and can be used for two-way authentication for client.

parameter.name: sslKeystorePassword
parameter.description: The store password for the key store file. This is optional for client and only needed if ssl.keystore.location is configured.

parameter.name: sslTruststoreLocation
parameter.description: The location of the trust store file.

parameter.name: sslTruststorePassword
parameter.description: The password for the trust store file.

parameter.name: batchSize
parameter.description: The producer will attempt to batch records together into fewer requests whenever multiple records are being sent to the same partition

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.description: An id string to pass to the server when making requests.

parameter.name: connectionsMaxIdleTime
parameter.description: Close idle connections after the number of milliseconds specified by this config.

parameter.name: lingerTime
parameter.description: The producer groups together any records that arrive in between request transmissions into a single batched request.

parameter.name: maxBlockTime
parameter.description: The configuration controls how long KafkaProducer.send() and KafkaProducer.partitionsFor() will block.

parameter.name: maxRequestSize
parameter.description: The maximum size of a request in bytes.

parameter.name: partitionerClass
parameter.description: Partitioner class that implements the Partitioner interface.

parameter.name: receiveBufferBytes
parameter.description: The size of the TCP receive buffer (SO_RCVBUF) to use when reading data.

parameter.name: requestTimeout
parameter.description: The configuration controls the maximum amount of time the client will wait for the response of a request.

parameter.name: saslJaasConfig
parameter.description: JAAS login context parameters for SASL connections in the format used by JAAS configuration files

parameter.name: saslKerberosServiceName
parameter.description: The Kerberos principal name that Kafka runs as.

parameter.name: securityProtocol
parameter.description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers.

parameter.name: sendBufferBytes
parameter.description: The size of the TCP send buffer (SO_SNDBUF) to use when sending data.

parameter.name: sslEnabledProtocols
parameter.description: The list of protocols enabled for SSL connections.

parameter.name: sslKeystoreType
parameter.description: The file format of the key store file. This is optional for client.

parameter.name: sslProtocol
parameter.description: The SSL protocol used to generate the SSLContext.

parameter.name: sslProvider
parameter.description: The name of the security provider used for SSL connections. Default value is the default security provider of the JVM.

parameter.name: sslTruststoreType
parameter.description: The file format of the trust store file.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: The configuration controls the maximum amount of time the server will wait for acknowledgments from followers to meet the acknowledgment requirements the producer has specified with the acks configuration

parameter.name: blockOnBufferFull
parameter.description: When our memory buffer is exhausted we must either stop accepting new records (block) or throw errors.

parameter.name: maxInFlightRequestsPerConnection
parameter.description: The maximum number of unacknowledged requests the client will send on a single connection before blocking.

parameter.name: metadataFetchTimeout
parameter.description: The first time data is sent to a topic we must fetch metadata about that topic to know which servers host the topic's partitions.

parameter.name: metadataMaxAge
parameter.description: The period of time in milliseconds after which we force a refresh of metadata even if we haven't seen any partition leadership changes to proactively discover any new brokers or partitions.

parameter.name: metricReporters
parameter.description: A list of classes to use as metrics reporters.

parameter.name: metricsNumSamples
parameter.description: The number of samples maintained to compute metrics.

parameter.name: metricsSampleWindow
parameter.description: The window of time a metrics sample is computed over.

parameter.name: reconnectBackoff
parameter.description: The amount of time to wait before attempting to reconnect to a given host.

parameter.name: retryBackoff
parameter.description: The amount of time to wait before attempting to retry a failed request to a given topic partition.

parameter.name: saslKerberosKinitCmd
parameter.description: Kerberos kinit command path.

parameter.name: saslKerberosMinTimeBeforeRelogin
parameter.description: Login thread sleep time between refresh attempts.

parameter.name: saslKerberosTicketRenewJitter
parameter.description: Percentage of random jitter added to the renewal time.

parameter.name: saslKerberosTicketRenewWindowFactor
parameter.description: Login thread will sleep until the specified window factor of time from last refresh to ticket's expiry has been reached, at which time it will try to renew the ticket.

parameter.name: sslCipherSuites
parameter.description: A list of cipher suites.

parameter.name: sslEndpointIdentificationAlgorithm
parameter.description: The endpoint identification algorithm to validate server hostname using server certificate.

parameter.name: sslKeymanagerAlgorithm
parameter.description: The algorithm used by key manager factory for SSL connections. Default value is the key manager factory algorithm configured for the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: sslSecureRandomImplementation
parameter.description: The SecureRandom PRNG implementation to use for SSL cryptography operations.

parameter.name: sslTrustmanagerAlgorithm
parameter.description: The algorithm used by trust manager factory for SSL connections. Default value is the trust manager factory algorithm configured for the Java Virtual Machine.

parameter.name: maxPoolSize
parameter.description: The connection pool maximum size
